mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBLUSERINFO WHERE PHONE=#{phone} AND PWD=#{pwd}
mapper.update: update tblUserInfo set pwd = #{pwd} where phone=#{phone}
mapper.select: SELECT OCCURTIME,OCCURMATTER,MONEY,BALANCE FROM (SELECT E.*,ROWNUM RN FROM TBLUSERACCOUT E WHERE E.USERID=#{userid} AND ROWNUM<=#{page}*5)WHERE RN>=#{page}*5-4 ORDER BY OCCURTIME DESC
SELECT ROWNUM NUM,SETMEALID,SETMEALNAME FROM (SELECT E.*,ROWNUM RN FROM TBLSETMEAL E WHERE ROWNUM<=#{page}*5)WHERE RN>=#{page}*5-4
SELECT C.ITEMNAME FROM TBLSETMEAL A,TBLSETMEALITME B,TBLPROJECT C WHERE A.SETMEALID=B.SETMEALID AND B.PROJECTID=C.PROJECTID AND A.SETMEALID=#{mid}
SELECT ROWNUM NUM,SETMEALID,SETMEALNAME FROM(SELECT E.*,ROWNUM RN FROM TBLSETMEAL E WHERE SETMEALNAME LIKE '%${name}%' AND ROWNUM<=#{page}*5)WHERE RN>=#{page}*5-4
